overview: A young boy's discovery of a mysterious gas mask provides a glimpse into an alternate reality. Featuring America's Got Talent's "Hammerstep," a traditional Irish/hip-hop dance troupe, and nine-year-old Aidan Lok, who has a first degree black belt in Shotokan Karate and has won over 100 medals from local, national, and international karate tournaments.
title: Indigo Grey: The Passage
